reg_info.act_under: Financial Administration Act   Loi sur l’administration financière

content.content: 1. (1) The Minister of Finance may destroy securities issued and held by the Province of Ontario if the securities are of no further value because they have been paid, cancelled or redeemed by the Province. O. Reg. 31/91, s. 1 (1). (2) The Minister of Finance shall prepare and retain a destruction certificate listing the destroyed securities. O. Reg. 31/91, s. 1 (2).
content.raw_html:
1. (1) The Minister of Finance may destroy securities issued and held by the Province of Ontario if the securities are of no further value because they have been paid, cancelled or redeemed by the Province. O. Reg. 31/91, s. 1 (1).

(2) The Minister of Finance shall prepare and retain a destruction certificate listing the destroyed securities. O. Reg. 31/91, s. 1 (2).
